knimeNode.name: Column List Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Iterates over a list of columns

fullDescription.intro: This loop starting node iterates over a list of columns of the input table. Its columns are divided into two sets, the "excluded" columns will always be included in any iteration, the "included" columns will be visible once in each iteration.

ports.outPort: The input table with the included columns for each iteration only
